title: Scoreboard
custom_preconds: Given you have installed a QA build
custom_steps:
When An ad banner is added serverside to the bottom of the scoreboard

screen="ScoreboardActivity"
custom_expected:
Then the ad banner will display on the bottom of the scoreboard
And the banner will fit on various screen sizes
And the banner will be clear/readable

title: MLB.TV EPG
custom_preconds: Given you have installed a QA build
custom_steps:
When An ad banner is added serverside to the bottom of the MLB.TV EPG

screen="MlbTvActivity,MlbTvListView,MediaProgramGuideController"
custom_expected:
Then the ad banner will display on the bottom of the MLB.TV EPG
And the banner will fit on various screen sizes
And the banner will be clear/readable

title: Team Page
custom_preconds: Given you have installed a QA build
custom_steps:
When An ad banner is added serverside to the bottom of a team page
And the ad banner is targeted to a specific team

screen="TeamHomeActivity"
custom_expected:
Then the ad banner will display on the bottom of the targeted team page
And the banner will fit on various screen sizes
And the banner will be clear/readable
Abd the ad banner will not display on the bottom of any team page that is not targeted

title: Launch External Webview
custom_preconds:
Given you have installed the QA build
And there is a banner at the bottom of the scoreboard
And the banner is linked to a external browser webpage

type = "image_external"
custom_expected:
Then the native browser will open
And the corresponding web page will be displayed

title: Launch Internal Webview
custom_preconds:
Given you have installed the QA build
And there is a banner at the bottom of the scoreboard
And the banner is linked to a internal webpage

type="image"
custom_expected:
Then the web page will open within the app
And the user will be able to return to the app by exiting the webview

title: Launch Video
custom_preconds:
Given you have installed the QA build
And there is a banner at the bottom of the scoreboard
And the banner is linked to a video

type="video"
custom_steps: When the user taps on the banner
custom_expected:
Then the custom video player will launch
And the video will begin to play

title: Closeable
custom_preconds:
Given you have installed the QA build
Then there is a banner at the bottom of the scoreboard that is closeable

closable="true"
custom_steps: When you tap on the upper right corner of the banner
custom_expected:
Then the banner will close
And the banner will not reappear in subsequent sessions

title: Not Closeable
custom_preconds:
Given you have installed the QA build
Then there is a banner at the bottom of the scoreboard that does not allow itself to be closed

closable="false"
custom_steps: When the user attempts to close the banner
custom_expected: Then the banner remains open and does not allow itself to be closed.

title: Banner Removal
custom_preconds:
Given you have installed the QA build
The there is an ad banner on the scoreboard
custom_steps: When the user removes the banner from the extras file
custom_expected: Then the banner will be removed from on the scoreboard

title: Launch Paywall
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And a banner has been configured to the top of the scoreboard that is set to launch the paywall (ie. Free trial banner)
And the user is a lite user
custom_steps: When the user taps on the banner
custom_expected: Then the At Bat Paywall should be launched.
